reference_summary:
BUTEFO 4 Pack Shower and Bath Set with Natural Boar Bristles Bath Brush, Pumice Stone Brush for Foot Callus, Dry Brush SPA Massage for Cellulite and Lymphatic, Natural Loofah Sponge for Women Kids
BUTEFO
{'Material': 'Sponge', 'Brand': 'BUTEFO', 'Power Source': 'Hand_powered', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Massage,Massaging,Tightening,Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '14.29 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 13.44 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'BUTEFO'}
I was really excited to have this back brush. But when I went to put it together it didn’t go... no matter how hard I tried! That was upsetting. I had to get my dremel out to sand it down so it fit better and it’s still not all the way on. With that said, the brush is super nice and scratchy on the back. And the foot brush/pumice stone is really nice too! I hope your brush combo has less flaws.
Didn’t fit
Training Head Hairdressing Head Rainbow Synthetic Fiber Hair 24inch Mannequin Cosmetology Manikin Dolls Head for Hairdresser Styling Practicing with Free Clamp + DIY Hair Styling Braid Set
SENSAIRUITE
{'Brand': 'SENSAIRUITE', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 6.93 x 6.5 inches; 1.83 Pounds'}
[[VIDEOID:3e9a0a4c1e05b8d79256b9b63cdd466f]] One of the main reasons I got this head was to use hot tools on it to practice before I used them on me. IT DOES NOT CURL!!!! It says that it does, but it doesn’t. I have tried 3-4 different hot tools and it won’t hold a curl at all. The hair is soft, it’s very thick. So if you wanted it just to do some braiding, it would work well for that. Not happy.
DOES NOT CURL!!!!
LXIANGN Soft Rubber Nail Polish Bottle Holder Stand Anti Spill Bottle Holder Display Manicure Tools for Women (Pink and Orange)
LXIANGN

These are nice to have. It holds your polish bottle really well. But it's still easy to pick up. You have to kindof fight to get them in them, but that just means they will stay put.
They work
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Interaction**: Continues to engage with personal care products, emphasizing bath and shower accessories, hairdressing tools, and now specific manicure tools.
- **Quality Expectations**: Maintains a high standard for product functionality and usability, actively expressing dissatisfaction with assembly issues or performance that does not align with advertising. Recent experiences reinforce the demand for reliable functionality.
- **Material Preference**: Consistently interested in natural and synthetic materials, with a strong preference for eco-friendly and sustainable options remaining evident.
- **Product Benefits**: Seeks multifaceted benefits from products, exploring items that not only enhance grooming but also facilitate skill development in personal styling.
- **User Experience**: Displays a hands-on, practical approach, often making modifications for optimal performance and reflecting a desire for effective, user-friendly solutions.
- **Target Audience**: Interested in various products suitable for children, emphasizing a family-oriented mindset alongside a focus on specialized tools for personal grooming.
- **Overall Sentiment**: Exhibits a mixed sentiment towards products; appreciates high-quality items that meet expectations but shows disappointment when usability or performance claims are unmet. The latest purchase highlights a preference for tools that maintain efficiency while ensuring usability and ease of access.
